trans-unit.source: Represents a service principal name (SPN) for an identity when the binding uses Kerberos.
trans-unit.target: 當繫結使用 Kerberos 時，代表身分識別的服務主要名稱 (SPN)。

trans-unit.source: An SPN is the name by which a client uniquely identifies an instance of a service.
trans-unit.target: SPN 是用戶端用來唯一識別服務執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you install multiple instances of a service on computers throughout a forest, each instance must have its own SPN.
trans-unit.target: 若您透過樹系在電腦上安裝多個服務執行個體，則每個執行個體都須有自己的 SPN。

trans-unit.source: A given service instance can have multiple SPNs if there are multiple names that clients might use for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 若用戶端需使用多個名稱進行驗證，則指定的服務執行個體可擁有多個 SPN。

trans-unit.source: When a client wants to connect to a service, it locates an instance of the service, composes an SPN for that instance, and sets the identity to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: 當用戶端要連接服務時，它會尋找服務執行個體，編出該執行個體的 SPN，並將身分識別設為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity>。

trans-unit.source: A check will be made that the message is intended for that service.
trans-unit.target: 會檢查該訊息是否要傳給該服務。

trans-unit.source: The three authentication modes used under Kerberos are:
trans-unit.target: Kerberos 使用的三種驗證模式為︰

trans-unit.source: SSPINegotiate
trans-unit.target: SSPINegotiate

trans-unit.source: Kerberos
trans-unit.target: Kerberos

trans-unit.source: KerberosOverTransport.
trans-unit.target: KerberosOverTransport.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows one common way to create an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼說明建立本類別執行個體的常用方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The identity for this service principal name (SPN).
trans-unit.target: 此服務主要名稱 (SPN) 的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity" /> with the specified identity claim.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的身分識別宣告，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity.SpnLookupTime%2A> property to 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 此建構函式會將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity.SpnLookupTime%2A> 屬性設定為 1 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create identities from a set of claims.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會顯示如何從一組宣告建立識別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="identity" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The claim type of <paramref name="identity" /> is not <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Spn" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 的宣告類型不是 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Spn" />。

trans-unit.source: The SPN.
trans-unit.target: SPN。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity" /> with the specified service principal name (SPN).
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的服務主要名稱 (SPN)，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity.SpnLookupTime%2A> property to 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 此建構函式會將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.SpnEndpointIdentity.SpnLookupTime%2A> 屬性設定為 1 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create identities from a string representation of the SPN.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會顯示如何從 SPN 的字串表示法建立識別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="spnName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="spnName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum time allowed to look up the service principal name (SPN).
trans-unit.target: 指定查閱服務主要名稱 (SPN) 所允許的最長時間。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: The value is set to less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 此值設為小於 0 的值。
